definition: Mount Qingcheng
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan

sentences.english: We can enjoy fresh air and great views in Mt. Qingcheng.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在青城山享受清新的空氣和宜人的風景。

sentences.english: Therefore, there were so many masters of martial arts who trained in Qingcheng Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在青城山修煉的道士中，出現了很多武林高手。

sentences.english: You can enjoy fresh air and great views in Mt. Qingcheng.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在青城山享受清新的空氣和宜人的風景。
